title: Bug 116564: The title of hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', now it changes with settings.
OB: The title of the hyperlink builder changes to 'www.actuate.com' after reopening it.
EB: The title of the hyperlink builder should remain as 'Hyperlink Options' even after reopening it.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Set a label hyperlink as 'www.actuate.com'.
2. Click on 'OK' to close the hyperlink builder.
3. Reopen the hyperlink builder.
